title: A Bird a Day
description: 366 beautiful birds from around the world to enjoy all year.The beauty and fascination of birds is unrivalled. As more of us turn to nature as a way to unwind, birdwatching has seen a surge in popularity in recent years, as reported by the New York Times and Vogue.In A Bird A Day, birder and author Dominic Couzens offers an insight into their world every day of the year. From Valentineâ€™s Day to Christmas, there is a bird to celebrate every occasion and brighten even the most ordinary day.Each fascinating bird story is connected to the season and illustrated with a photograph, illustration or painting. A Bird A Day is an inspiring collection that provides an insight into the private lives of our feathered friends and the communities they inhabit. A delightful and beautifully produced dip-in-and-out book for any nature lover.
author: Dominic Couzens
